issue.title: [CF 240] New condition:Pet Action/Stance
issue.body:
http://www.wowwiki.com/API_GetPetActionInfo
I made a macro, hope that will give you some help. :D

``` /script for i=1,NUM_PET_ACTION_SLOTS do local n, _, _,isa,isb=GetPetActionInfo(i); if isa~=nil then a=isa else a="a" end if isb~=nil then b=isb else b="b" end print (i.."-"..n.."-"..a.."-"..b) end ```


PET_ACTION_ATTACK
PET_ACTION_FOLLOW
PET_ACTION_MOVE_TO
PET_MODE_ASSIST PET_MODE_AGGRESSIVE
PET_MODE_DEFENSIVE
PET_MODE_PASSIVE
